text: The 1914–15 SK Rapid Wien season was the 17th season in club history. ==Squad== ===Squad and statistics=== ===Squad statistics=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !rowspan="2" valign="bottom"|Nat. !rowspan="2" valign="bottom"|Name !colspan="2" width="85"|League !valign="bottom"|Discipline |- !Apps !Goals !13px |- !colspan=13|Goalkeepers |- |||align="left"|Josef Koceny ||1|| || |- |||align="left"|Gustav Krainer ||2|| || |- |||align="left"|Franz Leuthe ||6|| || |- !colspan=13|Defenders |- |||align="left"|Franz Balzer ||3|| || |- |||align="left"|Fritz Brandstetter ||7|| || |- |||align="left"|Franz Kux ||1|| || |- |||align="left"|Hans Pichler ||1|| || |- |||align="left"|Aladar Ronnert ||1|| || |- |||align="left"|Franz Scheiböck ||1|| || |- |||align="left"|Leopold Schölley ||1|| || |- |||align="left"|Willibald Stejskal ||4|| || |- |||align="left"|Hans Werner ||1|| || |- !colspan=13|Midfielders |- |||align="left"|Josef Brandstetter ||4||2|| |- |||align="left"|Robert Cimera ||3|| || |- |||align="left"|Josef Hagler ||1|| || |- |||align="left"|Josef Klima ||2|| || |- |||align="left"|Leopold Nitsch ||8|| || |- |||align="left"|Franz Schediwy ||9|| ||1 |- !colspan=13|Forwards |- |||align="left"|Eduard Bauer ||7||8 || |- |||align="left"|Gustav Blaha ||3||1 || |- |||align="left"|Johann Frassl ||3|| || |- |||align="left"|Hans Geiger ||1|| || |- |||align="left"|Leopold Grundwald ||3|| || |- |||align="left"|Heinz Körner ||3||1 || |- |||align="left"|Richard Kuthan ||7||7 || |- |||align="left"|Sebastian Ropausch ||1|| || |- |||align="left"|Rudolf Rupec ||4|| || |- |||align="left"|Ferdinand Swatosch ||6||2 || |- |||align="left"|Gustav Wieser ||8||1 || |- |||align="left"|Karl Wondrak ||4|| || |} ==Fixtures and results== ===League=== {| class="wikitable" Style="text-align: center" |- !
